ygData.subject: RE: Specializing
ygData.msgSnippet: I use conjur alot more, but I am glad I speced alter...
ygData.messageBody:
I use conjur alot more, but I am glad I speced alter...


>From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'" <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Specializing
>Date: Mon, 1 Nov 1999 10:08:15 -0500
>
>You may want to put more points into specialize alteration to make sure
>that
>goes up first, maybe 10 pts total. Some people say later it is conjuration
>that you'll want to use, but i use alteration a whole lot more at 31st than
>i due conjuration.
>
>You don't need to do anything special, they all go up in time.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: ElaineEC@... [mailto:ElaineEC@...]
>Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 10:05 AM
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Specializing
>
>
>From: ElaineEC@...
>
>I'm L20 now and just got specialize. Can someone the benefits of
>specialize.
> And is there anything special I need to do? I put a practice in each at
>my
>
>guild and they seem to be going up automatically. What else do I need to
>do?
>
>Thanks. :)
>
>Lividity on Cazic-Thule
>
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
>tolerated
>
